official_title: A resolution congratulating the National Treasury Employees Union on its 80th anniversary and commending the dedication to Federal employees of and continued service by the National Treasury Employees Union and the members of the National Treasury Employees Union.

summary.text: Congratulates the National Treasury Employees Union on its 80th anniversary.
